title: NPC和ANC有错误
author: Rioad
txt_content:
用指令创建NPC之后会报错 服务器版本是1.11 

开服过程中也会报错 开服中报错信息


[17:04:47] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event PlayerTeleportEvent to AdvanceNoCheat v3.6

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
AdvanceNoCheat已经停更，考虑其他反作弊插件吧
你可以尝试下更新citizens的版本，如果还是有这个问题，那就只能是AdvanceNoCheat的锅了

replies.author: Astronomer
replies.txt_content:
ANC插件比较劣质

建议换用AAC
Advanced Anti Cheat
